imdb.plot outline: Silver Sage television program features people 50+ who are living out loud- charting new waters, taking new risks, fulfilling life-long dreams- proving that life in the second half can rival, and in some ways, be even be better than the first half. Our purpose is to encourage you to live your life and forget your age.
imdb.title: Silver Sage
plot: _Silver Sage_ (qv) television program features people 50+ who are living out loud- charting new waters, taking new risks, fulfilling life-long dreams- proving that life in the second half can rival, and in some ways, be even be better than the first half. Our purpose is to encourage you to live your life and forget your age.
